name: Rock-Paper-Scissors-Football
description:
Motivation

Rock-Paper-Scissors-Football was created for  #BrackeysGameJam

Description

It uses  a well known  game-mechanic, Rock-Paper-Scissors and it's used to resolve the American-football plays.

Story

There's a football team, where all the players are robots. You will need the unconditional LOVE of your Hooligans for defeating that team.

Enjoy it.

Age rating ( Everyone )
